page.content: The most serious crime he has had to deal with was a murder investigation in Worcester.He finds it rather difficult to live a normal family life.People in the locality are constantly knocking at his door or telephoning him with all sorts of problems that they think a policeman should deal with. As a policeman he is a respected member of the community though people tend to be suspicious of him because of his job. Because of this he has few very close friends.In spite of these disadvantages he would still prefer to be a policeman in a village rather than one in a large city. When travelling between villages he uses his police vehicle and walks around the villages on foot,which he prefers.When he is walking his beat instructions come from headquarters
